name: Red Pluto
description:
Story

Sometime in the far-off future, the last of the human race has abandoned Earth as the Sun swells into a Red Giant. Seeking refuge, they arrive at the most distant planet in the solar system: their last hope, Pluto.

In Red Pluto, you play as a member of the exodus from Earth and must find a way to survive on this harsh and inhospitable world. Using your trusty pickaxe you must mine resources, craft upgrades and build shelters, and find a way to contact any other survivors.

Experience a vast, icy terrain, and a subtle but somber story that is waiting to be uncovered. You are not the only one to make it to Pluto, but have all the others been as lucky as you?

You find yourself alone on the planet, having to survive on what's left after the war, while also dealing with the pain the war has brought you.

  • Traverse and explore the treacherous conditions of a foreign planet, keeping track of your  vitals
  • Build, develop, maintain and upgrade your base, increasing your chances of survival.
  • Experience a storyline that is out of this world, yet hasn’t completely moved on from it.
Controls

Movement - WASD

Sprint - Shift

Jump - Space

Use Active Item - Left Click

Interact/Pick Up - E

Inventory - TAB

Quest Journal - J

Building Menu - B

Settings Menus - P
